name: Advanced Battlegrounds: The Future of Combat
name_original: Advanced Battlegrounds: The Future of Combat
description:
Advanced Battlegrounds: The Future of Combat is an action-shooter game developed by Techland. It was originally released in 2004. It was published by DreamCatcher Interactive. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Advanced Battlegrounds: The Future of Combat on PC.
